text: David Osborn Braley (May 31, 1941 â€“ October 26, 2020) was a Canadian politician, sports owner and businessman. He was the owner of the BC Lions, the Toronto Argonauts and Hamilton Tiger-Cats. He was appointed to the Senate of Canada in 2010 as a Conservative, but resigned three years later."PM names football tycoon to Senate" , Globe and Mail, May 20, 2010 He was a member of the Order of Canada and the Canadian Football Hall of Fame. He was born in Montreal, Quebec.
